casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. LORETTA MAE HINDAHL, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 3579 DATED this 13th day of May, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Five years concurrently imposed on December 15, 1976, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank John Jardine, Attorney from Whitehall, for his assistance to the defendant and this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack L. Green, Chairman; Peter G. Meloy.
